<style>
    
    .currency-item {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 8px;
        padding: 8px;
        font-weight: 300;
        font-size: 12px;
        border-radius: 4px;
        color: #4B5563;
        transition: background-color 0.2s;
        cursor: pointer;
    }
    .currency-item:hover {
        background-color: #F3F4F6;
    }
    .flag-zoom {
        transition: transform 0.2s;
    }
    .currency-item:hover .flag-zoom {
        transform: scale(1.2);
    }
    .mega-menu-engagement img {
        width: 100%;
        height: 140px;
        object-fit: cover;
        border-radius: 0.25rem;
        display: block;
    }
    .mega-menu h3 {
        color: #CFAA90;
        font-size: 14px;
        font-weight: 700;
        text-transform: uppercase;
    }
    .mega-menu a {
        text-transform: capitalize;
        font-size: 14px;
        color: #4B5563;
        transition: color 0.2s;
    }
    .mega-menu a:hover {
        color: #CFAA90;
    }
    .mega-menu .mega-img-container img {
        height: 100%;
        object-fit: cover;
    }
</style>

<script>
    
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
        // Currency dropdown
        const dropdown = document.getElementById('currency-dropdown');
        const menu = document.getElementById('currency-menu');
        const selectedCurrencySpan = document.getElementById('selected-currency');

        dropdown.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
            e.stopPropagation();
            menu.classList.toggle('hidden');
        });

        document.querySelectorAll('.currency-item').forEach(item => {
            item.addEventListener('click', (event) => {
                event.preventDefault();
                selectedCurrencySpan.textContent = item.dataset.currency;
                menu.classList.add('hidden');
            });
        });

        document.addEventListener('click', () => {
            menu.classList.add('hidden');
        });
    });
</script>
